verbs.description: People within Sen. John McCain ’s inner circle [V: have] informed the White House that the Arizona Republican does not want President Donald Trump at his funeral and would like Vice President Mike Pence to attend instead , according to a source close to McCain .

[ARG0: People within Sen. John McCain ’s inner circle] have [V: informed] [ARG1: the White House] [ARG2: that the Arizona Republican does not want President Donald Trump at his funeral and would like Vice President Mike Pence to attend instead] , [ARGM-ADV: according to a source close to McCain] .
